name: SearchTerminalRefunds
description:
Retrieve a filtered list of Interac Terminal refund requests.

Use this tool to get Interac Terminal refund requests created by the seller, available for up to 30 days. Ideal for managing recent refund activities or auditing transactions.

parameters.name: device_id_filter
parameters.description: `TerminalRefund` objects associated with a specific device. If not provided, all refunds for the account are displayed.

value_schema.description:
`TerminalRefund` objects associated with a specific device. If no device is specified, then all
`TerminalRefund` objects for the signed-in account are displayed.

parameters.name: start_datetime
parameters.description: A datetime in RFC 3339 format. Indicates when the time range starts for filtering terminal refunds.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
starts.

parameters.name: end_time_range
parameters.description: A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating the end of the time range for filtering terminal refund requests.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
ends.

parameters.name: filter_terminal_refund_status
parameters.description: Filter terminal refunds by status. Options: `PENDING`, `IN_PROGRESS`, `CANCEL_REQUESTED`, `CANCELED`, or `COMPLETED`.

value_schema.description:
Filtered results with the desired status of the `TerminalRefund`.
Options: `PENDING`, `IN_PROGRESS`, `CANCEL_REQUESTED`, `CANCELED`, or `COMPLETED`.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The order in which terminal refund results are listed. Use 'ASC' for oldest to newest or 'DESC' for newest to oldest (default).

value_schema.description:
The order in which results are listed.
- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor to paginate results, used to retrieve the next set from a previous query.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of refund results to retrieve in a single request.

value_schema.description: Limits the number of results returned for a single request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

`TerminalRefund` objects for the signed-in account are displayed.

ends.

value_schema.description:

ends.

Filtered results with the desired status of the `TerminalRefund`.
Options: `PENDING`, `IN_PROGRESS`, `CANCEL_REQUESTED`, `CANCELED`, or `COMPLETED`.

value_schema.description:
Filtered results with the desired status of the `TerminalRefund`.
Options: `PENDING`, `IN_PROGRESS`, `CANCEL_REQUESTED`, `CANCELED`, or `COMPLETED`.

The order in which results are listed.

value_schema.description:

- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:

Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

value_schema.description:

parameters.description: Limits the number of results returned for a single request.

value_schema.description: Limits the number of results returned for a single request.
